## removeURLScope() function
removeURLScope<!-- -->(<!-- -->url<!-- -->: [URL](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL)<!-- -->)<!-- -->: [URL](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL)

* `url` â€“ The URL to remove scope information from.
* Returns: A new URL without the scope information.


Returns a new URL without any scope information.

## Example

```js
removeURLScope(new URL('http://localhost/scope:96253/index.php'));
// URL('http://localhost/index.php')

removeURLScope(new URL('http://localhost/index.php'));
// URL('http://localhost/index.php')
```
